T227 Ty Cobb ~~~    Card will grade SGC/PSA 1 because of small paper loss on front. A few creases. Back is clean with NO paper loss. Measures perfect 2-5/16 x 3-3/8.


T227 Chief Bender ~~~   Card will probably grade PSA 1.5 or maybe a 2. Just a very, very tiny spot in blue area. Back is clean with NO paper loss. Measures perfect 2-5/16 x 3-3/8.

M/O or check is fine, Paypal is accepted by adding 3% to total. Shipping and insurance are FREE.

I would knock $75 off final price if purchased together.
